Menace
[i]Gleam and Shimmer[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, tap target creature you don't control.
[i]Sol[/i] – Whenever Severa deals combat damage to a player, you gain that much life. Spells you cast from exile this turn cost {X} less to cast, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {2}{R}{B} [i](You may put this card over another Severa creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
